topics.body:
For people who have no idea what we're talking about, We're talking about the first Gundam Alternate Universe, Mobile fighter G gundam.

Where all of the world's nations fight each other in gundam duels to decide who will rule over the earth sphere every 4 years.

topics.body:
Hey guys look I found Detroit Gundam!

[spoiler]!http://www.intergeo.com/static/cms/reference/Libyen_abfall.jpg![/spoiler] 


"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e923cd636872510e4c1800#post_54e923cd636872510e4c1800
HOW!?
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e923d36368724c3a2b0700#post_54e923d36368724c3a2b0700
Basically the gundam fight is officially sanctioned by all of the nations, So whichever nation who's gundam comes out on top will rule over the colonies for the next few years, No questions asked. (Also, Aiming for the cockpit is grounds for disqualification, So they have to destroy the head instead)
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e92407636872510e5e1800#post_54e92407636872510e5e1800
You know. That's what I love about some old stuff.

These Gundams all seem to adhere to silly cultural stereotypes.

Today it's unlikely that you'd see something like that, it would most likely be more like a generic black mech in order to be realistic. At least if it was done by the west. Japan is weird and just does what it wants.


Also. DAh. Great leader Stalin drive this mech to crush filthy capitalist pig dog mech.

*drinks vodka*
